Comic books, strips, etc. I. Lee, Christopher, 1922- II. McWilliams, Alden. III. Binder, Otto Oscar, 1911- IV. Tennis, Craig. V. Russ Jones Productions. VI. Stoker, Bram, 1847-1912. VII. Series. Call no.: PN6728.D68L4 1966
